description: This file serves as the entry point for a React application, initializing the React DOM and rendering the main App component into the DOM element with id 'root'. It imports React, ReactDOM, a CSS file, and the main App component.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components in the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM.
